name: SoftSwiss
tag_list: casino-software, casino-games, auction-platform, casino-platform, auction-software, custom-development, igaming-marketing
overview:
SoftSwiss is an Austrian IT company providing software solutions for ecommerce and iGaming. It specializes in the development of two main products – Merkeleon online auction platform and SoftSwiss online casino.

SoftSwiss online casino is a complete gaming solution which can be either used for starting online casino business from scratch or can be easily integrated with an existing iGaming website. Merkeleon online auction platform provides companies and individuals with a unique tool to start their way in the online auction business and offers a variety of auction types from Classic to Unique Bids to choose from.

With 25+ developers and over 6 years experience in software product development, SoftSwiss serves customers worldwide.

Other services provided by the company include iGaming consulting and marketing support, as well as custom software development. SoftSwiss engineers implement projects of various complexity in Php, .NET, RoR, Flash or HTML5.
